title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 8.16 - Revocation of grade marking stamps or stencils
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 8.16 - Revocation of grade marking stamps or stencils

State Regulations

Whenever the commissioner has evidence that any grade
marking stamp or stencil has been used contrary to law or to the provisions of
this Part, he may after hearing, direct the person to whom such stamp or
stencil was issued, to return same. After the commissioner has directed the
return of such grade marking stamp or stencil, it shall be illegal for the
person to whom it was issued or his registered agent to use such stamp or
stencil until the commissioner has authorized its reissue. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
8.16

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
